block.l: welcome to space land your goal is to help humanity survive
buy a stone factory the gray thing by clicking it
good job you bought a stone factory now buy a wood factory to the left
yay you are doing great now get about 3 wood and stone factories
good now save up 80 wood to unlock the park
great now i would buy about 20 to 35 of those parks
if you bought enough parks you should have 100 happiness now save up 1000 wood
now click on the new building thats the city hall it stops arguments
now buy a school the brown thing with yellow on it
good you now have smart people they will give you bounises on wood stone and parts
what are parts you may ask well buy the red building to find out
Also it costs stone to make parts from factories
good now save up 100 parts to unlock the refined stone factory
good job now save up 100 refined stone to unlock the university
Now you get bounis things from the university save 3000 refined stone to unlock the computer factory
now save up 20 computer chips to unlock the hospital
Good now you can do what you want I will come back in a bit to tell you about things
hi by the way the white thing with gray on it is a bank
it allows you to buy materals but you can only do this on computer:(
also the green purple and red thing is a library it gives you money from late books
the plantarim does the same thing
i almost forgot if you click on the yellowish thing it makes music and makes happiness
you found food your people can eat
Now try to save 100 computer chips and 50 people with a degree
So you can unlock super steel
By the way you need to click on the building to get super steel
you need 1 dollar to buy wood
you need 1 dollar to buy stone
you need 5 dollars to buy food
you need 10 dollars to buy parts
you need 50 dollars to buy refined stone
you need 100 dollars to buy a computer chip
ok now were cooking get 10 super steel to unlock lasers
you can click on the planet to get materals they have different chances to appere
city-1-1000 killing alians-1-100 finding plants to eat 1-50 mining stone 1-10 else trip failed
if you click on that gray building with a red door you get an arcade
it makes happiness go up to 5000
the blue building is a gym it makes money
now people can skate and make you money they are better than the gym
by the way there are 2 buildings i forgot to tell you about the house and the farm
the house lowers homeless people and the farm makes food
now its time to craft a building if you put a wood factory and a stone factory and a farm
than wait 15 seconds and you get a plastic factory

scripts.comment: right click on a function to see its code if you click on cheat codes in the function catigory you can see the cheat codes to type
